Thanks Jeremy, root cause seems to be:
The front page of the app is making a request to the GitHub API to server real-time stats. K8 cluster has a load balancer that is constantly pinging the front page of the app for health checks This causes the GitHub API to tell me I'm abusing their service because creating tons of requests per second.
Short Term Fix:
I'm removing GitHub API dependencies from front page load.
Long Term Fix:
Have a special route for just health check that is not the front page Install Gunicorn
